alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 4:00AM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON EST MONDAY FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 knots with gusts up to 25 knots today, and waves 1 to 2 feet expected. Beginning late tonight, west winds 20 to 25 knots with gusts up to 30 knots, and waves 2 to 3 feet expected. * WHERE...Lake Moultrie. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on Lake Moultrie will create hazardous conditions for small craft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Today, winds will be strongest on the south and southwest facing shoreline of Lake Moultrie. The strongest winds will occur late tonight and continue through Monday morning across the entire lake.
info.instruction: Boaters on Lake Moultrie should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft.
